1: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>though</n> יַעֲמֹ֨ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stood</n> מֹשֶׁ֤ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>unto me Though Moses</n> וּשְׁמוּאֵל֙ <sup>8050 </sup> <n>and Samuel</n> לְפָנַ֔י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>Me</n> נַפְשִׁ֖י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>me [yet] my mind</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[could] not [be] toward this people</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> שַׁלַּ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>cast [them] out</n> מֵֽעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> פָּנַ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of my sight</n> וְיֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and let them go forth</n>
2: וְהָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be that</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יֹאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass if they say</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> אָ֣נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>Where</n> נֵצֵ֑א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>unto thee Whither shall we go forth</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <sup>559 </sup> <n>? then thou shalt tell</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>those</n> לַמָּ֤וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>Such as [are] for death</n> לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>to death</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and those</n> לַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and such as [are] for the sword</n> לַחֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>to the sword</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and those</n> לָֽרָעָב֙ <sup>7458 </sup> <n>and such as [are] for the famine</n> לָֽרָעָ֔ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>to the famine</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>and those</n> לַשְּׁבִ֖י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>and such as [are] for the captivity</n> לַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <sup>7628 </sup> <n>to the captivity</n>
3: וּפָקַדְתִּ֨י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>And I will appoint</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אַרְבַּ֤ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>over them four</n> מִשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>kinds</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> לַֽהֲרֹ֔ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>to slay</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכְּלָבִ֖ים <sup>3611 </sup> <n>and the dogs</n> לִסְחֹ֑ב <sup>5498 </sup> <n>to tear</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ע֧וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of the heaven</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <sup>929 </sup> <n>and the beasts</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to devour</n> וּלְהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and destroy</n>
4: וּנְתַתִּ֣ים <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will cause</n> [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַֽעֲוָ֔ה <sup>2113 </sup> <n>be removed</n> ק) לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>into all kingdoms</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> בִּ֠גְלַל <sup>1558 </sup> <n>because</n> מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>of Manasseh</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <sup>2396 </sup> <n>of Hezekiah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> עַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>for [that] which he did</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n>
5: כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יַחְמֹ֤ל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>For who shall have pity</n> עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>Jerusalem</n> וּמִ֖י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יָנ֣וּד <sup>5110 </sup> <n>will mourn</n> לָ֑ךְ וּמִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יָס֔וּר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>thee? or who shall go aside</n> לִשְׁאֹ֥ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>to ask</n> לְשָׁלֹ֖ם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>favor</n> לָֽךְ׃
6: אַ֣תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> נָטַ֥שְׁתְּ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>Thou hast forsaken</n> אֹתִ֛י <sup>853 </sup> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>me saith</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אָח֣וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>backward</n> תֵּלֵ֑כִי <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> וָאַ֨ט <sup>5186 </sup> <n>therefore will I stretch out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדִ֤י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hand</n> עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וָֽאַשְׁחִיתֵ֔ךְ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>against thee and destroy</n> נִלְאֵ֖יתִי <sup>3811 </sup> <n>thee I am weary</n> הִנָּחֵֽם׃ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>with repenting</n>
7: וָאֶזְרֵ֥ם <sup>2219 </sup> <n>And I will fan</n> בְּמִזְרֶ֖ה <sup>4214 </sup> <n>them with a fan</n> בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <sup>8179 </sup> <n>in the gates</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> שִׁכַּ֤לְתִּי <sup>7921 </sup> <n>I will bereave</n> אִבַּ֙דְתִּי֙ <sup>6 </sup> <n>[them] of children I will destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> מִדַּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>not from their ways</n> לוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָֽׁבוּ׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[since] they return</n>
8: עָֽצְמוּ־ <sup>6105 </sup> <n>are increased</n> לִ֤י אַלְמְנֹתָו֙ <sup>490 </sup> <n>Their widows</n> מֵח֣וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>to me above the sand</n> יַמִּ֔ים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the seas</n> הֵבֵ֨אתִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>I have brought</n> לָהֶ֥ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>them</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֛ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>upon them against the mother</n> בָּח֖וּר <sup>970 </sup> <n>of the young men</n> שֹׁדֵ֣ד <sup>7703 </sup> <n>a spoiler</n> בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <sup>6672 </sup> <n>at noonday</n> הִפַּ֤לְתִּי <sup>5307 </sup> <n>I have caused [him] to fall</n> עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> פִּתְאֹ֔ם <sup>6597 </sup> <n>upon it suddenly</n> עִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>upon the city</n> וּבֶהָלֽוֹת׃ <sup>928 </sup> <n>and terrors</n>
9: אֻמְלְלָ֞ה <sup>535 </sup> <n>languisheth</n> יֹלֶ֣דֶת <sup>3205 </sup> <n>She that hath borne</n> הַשִּׁבְעָ֗ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> נָפְחָ֥ה <sup>5301 </sup> <n>she hath given up</n> נַפְשָׁ֛הּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the ghost</n> [בָּאָה כ] (בָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>abide</n> ק) שִׁמְשָׁ֛הּ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>her sun</n> בְּעֹ֥ד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>yet</n> יוֹמָ֖ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>day</n> בּ֣וֹשָׁה <sup>954 </sup> <n>she hath been ashamed</n> וְחָפֵ֑רָה <sup>2659 </sup> <n>and confounded</n> וּשְׁאֵֽרִיתָ֗ם <sup>7611 </sup> <n>and the residue</n> לַחֶ֧רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>to the sword</n> אֶתֵּ֛ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>of them will I deliver</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>their enemies</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
10: אֽוֹי־ <sup>188 </sup> <n>Woe</n> לִ֣י אִמִּ֔י <sup>517 </sup> <n>is me my mother</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יְלִדְתִּ֗נִי <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that thou hast borne</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>me a man</n> רִ֛יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>of strife</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and a man</n> מָד֖וֹן <sup>4066 </sup> <n>of contention</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the whole earth</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> נָשִׁ֥יתִי <sup>5383 </sup> <n>I have neither lent on usury</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> נָֽשׁוּ־ <sup>5383 </sup> <n>nor men have lent to me on usury</n> בִ֖י כֻּלֹּ֥ה <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to me everyone</n> מְקַלְלַֽונִי׃ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>[yet] every one of them doth curse</n> ס
11: אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>verily</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> [שָׁרֹותִךָ כ] (שֵֽׁרִיתִ֖יךָ <sup>8325 </sup> <n>Sharar</n> ק) לְט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>it shall be well</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> ל֣וֹא ׀ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הִפְגַּ֣עְתִּֽי <sup>6293 </sup> <n>to entreat</n> בְךָ֗ בְּעֵ֥ת־ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>thee [well] in the time</n> רָעָ֛ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of evil</n> וּבְעֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>and in the time</n> צָרָ֖ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of affliction</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֹיֵֽב׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>I will cause the enemy</n>
12: הֲיָרֹ֨עַ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>break</n> בַּרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>Shall iron</n> בַּרְזֶ֛ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>iron</n> מִצָּפ֖וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>the northern</n> וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <sup>5178 </sup> <n>brasen</n>
13: חֵילְךָ֧ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>Thy substance</n> וְאוֹצְרוֹתֶ֛יךָ <sup>214 </sup> <n>and thy treasures</n> לָבַ֥ז <sup>957 </sup> <n>to the spoil</n> אֶתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>will I give</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> בִמְחִ֑יר <sup>4242 </sup> <n>without price</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> חַטֹּאותֶ֖יךָ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>and [that] for all thy sins</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>even in all thy borders</n>
14: וְהַֽעֲבַרְתִּי֙ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>And I will make [thee] to pass</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>with thine enemies</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into a land</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדָ֑עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[which] thou knowest</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵ֛שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>not for a fire</n> קָדְחָ֥ה <sup>6919 </sup> <n>is kindled</n> בְאַפִּ֖י <sup>639 </sup> <n>in mine anger</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תּוּקָֽד׃ <sup>3344 </sup> <n>[which] shall burn</n> ס
15: אַתָּ֧ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> יָדַ֣עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>thou knowest</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> זָכְרֵ֤נִי <sup>2142 </sup> <n>remember</n> וּפָקְדֵ֙נִי֙ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>me and visit</n> וְהִנָּ֤קֶם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>me and revenge</n> לִי֙ מֵרֹ֣דְפַ֔י <sup>7291 </sup> <n>me of my persecutors</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> לְאֶ֥רֶךְ <sup>750 </sup> <n>of your patience</n> אַפְּךָ֖ <sup>639 </sup> <n>anger</n> תִּקָּחֵ֑נִי <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take me not away</n> דַּ֕ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>know</n> שְׂאֵתִ֥י <sup>5375 </sup> <n>that for thy sake I have suffered</n> עָלֶ֖יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>your sake</n> חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>rebuke</n>
16: נִמְצְא֤וּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>were found</n> דְבָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Thy words</n> וָאֹ֣כְלֵ֔ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>and I did eat</n> וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> [דְבָרֶיךָ כ] (דְבָֽרְךָ֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>your words</n> ק) לִ֔י לְשָׂשׂ֖וֹן <sup>8342 </sup> <n>was unto me the joy</n> וּלְשִׂמְחַ֣ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and rejoicing</n> לְבָבִ֑י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of mine heart</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִקְרָ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>for I am called</n> שִׁמְךָ֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by thy name</n> עָלַ֔י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> ס
17: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יָשַׁ֥בְתִּי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>I sat</n> בְסוֹד־ <sup>5475 </sup> <n>not in the assembly</n> מְשַׂחֲקִ֖ים <sup>7832 </sup> <n>of the mockers</n> וָֽאֶעְלֹ֑ז <sup>5937 </sup> <n>nor rejoiced</n> מִפְּנֵ֤י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> יָֽדְךָ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thy hand</n> בָּדָ֣ד <sup>910 </sup> <n>alone</n> יָשַׁ֔בְתִּי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>I sat</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>with</n> זַ֖עַם <sup>2195 </sup> <n>me with indignation</n> מִלֵּאתָֽנִי׃ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>for thou hast filled</n> ס
18: לָ֣מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> הָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>been</n> כְאֵבִי֙ <sup>3511 </sup> <n>Why is my pain</n> נֶ֔צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>perpetual</n> וּמַכָּתִ֖י <sup>4347 </sup> <n>and my wound</n> אֲנוּשָׁ֑ה֙ <sup>605 </sup> <n>incurable</n> מֵֽאֲנָה֙ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>[which] refuseth</n> הֵֽרָפֵ֔א <sup>7495 </sup> <n>to be healed</n> הָי֨וֹ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>been</n> תִֽהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>been</n> לִי֙ כְּמ֣וֹ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> אַכְזָ֔ב <sup>391 </sup> <n>? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a liar</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[and as] waters</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נֶאֱמָֽנוּ׃ <sup>539 </sup> <n>[that] fail</n> ס
19: לָכֵ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> תָּשׁ֤וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>If thou return</n> וַאֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>then will I bring thee again</n> לְפָנַ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> תַּֽעֲמֹ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>[and] thou shalt stand</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and if</n> תּוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>me and if thou take forth</n> יָקָ֛ר <sup>3368 </sup> <n>the precious</n> מִזּוֹלֵ֖ל <sup>2151 </sup> <n>from the vile</n> כְּפִ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>thou shalt be as my mouth</n> תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> יָשֻׁ֤בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>let them return</n> הֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>their part</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תָשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>unto thee but return</n> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n>
20: וּנְתַתִּ֜יךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> לָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thee unto this people</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> לְחוֹמַ֤ת <sup>2346 </sup> <n>wall</n> נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <sup>5178 </sup> <n>brasen</n> בְּצוּרָ֔ה <sup>1219 </sup> <n>a fenced</n> וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and they shall fight</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> י֣וּכְלוּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>against thee but they shall not prevail</n> לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִתְּךָ֥ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֛י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> לְהוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֥ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>against thee for I [am] with thee to save</n> וּלְהַצִּילֶ֖ךָ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>thee and to deliver</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>thee saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
